 get the applied scaling

Detailed Description

interface for a function to correct (or apply) the SiPM saturation

This function has to return a saturated or saturation corrected amplitude for a specific description of the saturation.

Author:
Benjamin.Lutz@desy.de
Version:
0.1
Date:
October 2009
